								<DC:OffenceCode>CJ03509</DC:OffenceCode>
								<DC:OffenceWording>Application to amend the requirements of a suspended sentence order made by CROYDON MAGISTRATES' COURT on DD/MM/YYYY on the ground that FORGOT TO TELL BENCH SOMETHING IMPORTANT & ASKS FOR CURFEW TO BE SUSPENDED FOR 1 DAY ON DD/MM/YYYY.;In accordance with Part 3 of Schedule 12 to the Criminal Justice Act 2003.</DC:OffenceWording>

							<DC:Result>
								<DC:ResultCode>1508</DC:ResultCode>
								<DC:ResultText>Suspended sentence imposed by Croydon Magistrates' Court on DD/MM/YYYY for the offence(s) of assault, criminal damage x 2 varied. Original end date of order DD/MM/YYYY. Suspended sentence order now as follows: Committed to prison for a term of 12 WEEKS suspended for 18 months. The defendant must now comply with the following requirements within the supervision period of 18 months: Existing requirements to continue: Curfew Requirement: Be under a curfew for 7 weeks. Start date DD/MM/YYYY. End date DD/MM/YYYY. Offender to remain at ABOVE ADDRESS, MONDAYS ONLY , 18.00 HRS TO 05.00 HRS - NEW CURFEW PERIOD.</DC:ResultText>

								<DC:ResultText>Curfew Requirement: Be under a curfew for 7 weeks. Start date DD/MM/YYYY. End date DD/MM/YYYY. Offender to remain at ABOVE ADDRESS, MONDAYS ONLY , 18.00 HRS TO 05.00 HRS - NEW CURFEW PERIOD.</DC:ResultText>
